messages.subject: reference books
messages.msgSnippet: I wanted to mention how much I ve enjoyed the reference book discussion. I ve been picking them up here and there and putting them on the shelf and kitchen
messages.messageBody:
I wanted to mention how much I've enjoyed the reference book discussion.
I've been picking them up here and there and putting them on the shelf and
kitchen table etc and now Matthew is *sleeping* with his Scholastic Atlas of
the World lol he thinks it's so cool. I remember really loving our set of
encyclopdedias and reference books until I *had* to start using them to look
stuff up for school. Hopefully Matthew will retain his love for the books I
remember.....as really cool places to read tidbits about all kinds of really
neat people places things and animals.

Marietta
Matthew 4 1/2
Alexander 1
